solutions.desc: 遍历时记录当前最大值和最大次数。
solutions.code:
class Solution:
    def getWinner(self, arr: List[int], k: int) -> int:
        n = len(arr)
        nmax = max(arr)
        if k >= n: return nmax
        curIndex = 0
        curCount = 0
        while curCount < k:
            # print(f'===> curIndex = {curIndex}, curCount = {curCount}, arr = {arr}')
            if arr[curIndex] == nmax: return nmax
            nextIndex = (curIndex + 1) % n
            if arr[curIndex] > arr[nextIndex]:
                arr[curIndex], arr[nextIndex] = arr[nextIndex], arr[curIndex]
            else:
                curCount = 0
            curCount += 1
            curIndex = nextIndex
            # print(f'curIndex = {curIndex}, curCount = {curCount}, arr = {arr}')
        return arr[curIndex]
